page.title: 14Bee-keeping, The Narth. .1.
page.content: Honey is the sweetest, most nutritious natural food, even Stone Age Man used to collect it. Before sugar beet honey was the only sweetener. Beehives were written about in the first Domesday Book. Bees are not only useful for honey but also farmers like them because they pollinate their crops. Bees give 3 things:1. honey 2. wax 3. propolis. 1. Honey is the food of the bees. 2. Wax is made in to combs to store the honey in and lay their eggs.It is made in to polish. 3. Propolis is a sticky substance which the bees use to fill holes and gaps in their hive. It is used in varnish.
